name: water-mapper-website
description: Simple website for Water Mapper app.

scripts.sass: sass src/styles.sass:src/styles.css --style=compressed && postcss src/styles.css --use autoprefixer -o src/styles.css
scripts.sass:watch: sass --watch src/styles.sass:src/styles.css && postcss src/styles.css --use autoprefixer -o src/styles.css
scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 1 src/CNAME src/robots.txt src/**/*.html src/styles.css src/resources/**/* build
scripts.build: npm run clean-site && npm run sass && npm run generate-favicon && npm run copy-files

author: Sem Spanhaak
